sentences.sContent: I have a passion for archaeology .
His special interest was archaeology and art history.
sentences.sContent_eng: His special interest was archaeology and art history.
sentences.sCn: 他对考古学和艺术史有特殊的兴趣。

remMethod.val: arch(古老的) + ae + ology(…学) → 考古学

words.tran: [古] 考古学的；[古] 考古学上的

trans.tranOther: the study of ancient societies by examining what remains of their buildings,  grave s  , tools etc
